title: Issue a Litigation Hold Notice
description: When new litigation is anticipated, an in-house counsel must issue a litigation hold notice to all relevant employees to preserve documents.

tasks.description: Identify the employees and departments likely to have relevant documents for the new matter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of custodians (e.g., key engineers, sales team).

tasks.description: Draft a litigation hold notice that clearly explains the subject of the litigation and the employees' obligation to preserve all related documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a clear and comprehensive legal hold memo.

tasks.description: Distribute the notice to all identified custodians and track their acknowledgements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the notice and monitors who has acknowledged receipt.
